# 智易參與CDP問卷評比，獲評「氣候變遷」、「水」及「森林」B管理等級
2025 / 04 / 17 
![智易參與CDP問卷評比，獲評「氣候變遷」、「水」及「森林」B管理等級](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/CDP3_YxSJEUA.jpg)
智易參與2024年國際碳揭露計畫（Carbon Disclosure Project, CDP）評比，於「氣候變遷」、「水」、「森林」三大項目獲評B級管理等級，展現公司在氣候治理上的積極作為與透明揭露。
CDP評比著重於企業溫室氣體排放資訊的揭露，以及其針對氣候變遷風險與機會的管理措施。2024年全球參與CDP評比的企業已突破2.5萬家，台灣地區提交問卷的企業數達到超過700家，年增率逾12%，顯示氣候議題在產業鏈中的重要性持續提升。
智易持續以具前瞻性的視角應對氣候變遷挑戰，積極響應國際倡議與行動。除了從循環經濟觀點進行產品設計，也從製程、營運及供應鏈等多面向推動減碳工作。2023年，智易正式設定SBTi科學基礎減碳目標（Science Based Targets initiative, SBTi），以2022年為基準年，承諾於2040年達成組織內溫室氣體（範疇一與範疇二）淨零排放，並於2050年實現組織外間接排放（範疇三）淨零目標。
為強化氣候韌性與減碳能力，智易擬定多元且全面的氣候行動策略，包括：導入ISO 50001能源管理系統、提升再生能源使用率、發展低碳與高能效產品、導入低碳運輸路線，並強化低碳供應鏈管理。其中，智易推動「Go Green with Arcadyan」專案，攜手14家供應商共同落實碳管理，透過產品碳足跡盤查、包材優化、物流減碳等具體行動，在2024年達成組織型減碳95,302公噸、產品減碳11,106公噸的成果，顯著提升智易範疇三的溫室氣體減量績效。
透過持續提升能源使用效率，結合核心技術與創新設計，智易致力於落實溫室氣體減量，共同為全球氣候永續盡一份心力。

# 智易科技專注永續，連續兩年榮獲「TCSA台灣100大永續典範企業獎」
2024 / 12 / 11 
![智易科技專注永續，連續兩年榮獲「TCSA台灣100大永續典範企業獎」](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/20241211_01.jpg)
2024年12月11日，智易由執行副總 盧豐裕代表，再度獲頒「台灣100大永續典範企業獎」及「企業永續報告獎—銀級」兩項大獎，展現智易在永續發展領域的卓越表現。「TCSA台灣企業永續獎」由台灣永續能源研究基金會（TAISE）主辦。歷年參獎企業家數達到882家，占全台上市公司市值85.8%，顯示企業永續發展已是各界關注焦點。
智易憑藉卓越的綠色產品研發技術，2024年7月月12日於印度新德里獲頒印度循環經濟論壇（India Circular Economy Forum, ICEF）循環經濟技術獎，表彰智易為對循環經濟具有傑出貢獻的先驅者。
智易於2024年通過SBTi科學基礎減量目標審查，訂定短期減碳與長期淨零的具體減量目標。智易積極擴充越南生產中心高功率太陽能光伏發電系統，逐步提升了再生能源使用比例。台灣總部也預計於2026年完成太陽能發電系統建構，積極實現低碳營運。
智易致力於綠色供應鏈管理，推出「Go Green with Arcadyan」計畫，透過系統性的供應商碳排輔導，協助供應鏈夥伴進行溫室氣體及產品碳足跡減量，促進整體產業鏈的永續發展，亦彰顯智易在產業供應鏈中擔任的領導角色。
智易在眾多參賽企業中脫穎而出，為持續推動永續發展奠定了堅實的基石。智易將以此為契機，繼續發揮創新與專業優勢，攜手合作夥伴，共同邁向更美好的未來。

# 智易通過SBTi減碳及淨零的目標審查
2024 / 07 / 12 
![智易通過SBTi減碳及淨零的目標審查](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/SBTi_zimyVTB.png)
在AI與數位轉型快速增長時代，智易扮演轉型過程的重要推手。在面對氣候變遷衝擊，智易積極參與國際倡議及客戶關注的再生能源使用，努力朝向淨零目標前行。公司於2022年提出 SBTi 科學基礎減量目標倡議的承諾，採用科學為基礎的方法學設定淨零減碳目標，並規劃減碳行動藍圖，以系統化方式追蹤管理智易的碳資產佈局；此外，公司也積極響應RE100倡議，每年採購再生能源憑證，致力於2030年100%使用再生能源，實現環境永續。  
  
智易於2023年底提交減碳目標，並於2024年七月通過SBTi審查。SBTi官網公布智易設定2022年為基準年，組織內溫室氣體（範疇1+2）於2040年達到淨零排放目標，短期目標設定為2030年絕對減量50%。其他間接排放溫室氣體（範疇3）亦計畫於2050年達到淨零排放目標，短期目標設定於2030年強度減量達66%。  
  
智易每季追蹤與檢討減碳績效進度，並根據市場與科技發展的趨勢，機動性調整減碳行動方案，確保符合客戶期待與實現組織與產品脫碳目標。智易承諾資訊的透明度，每年於永續報告書中如實揭露智易集團碳排放量及目標進度，以落實公司在減碳行動與企業價值上的最佳實踐。

# 智易AVC越南製造中心經RBA VAP稽核 取得白金級證書
2024 / 05 / 10 
![智易AVC越南製造中心經RBA VAP稽核 取得白金級證書](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/RBA_VAP%E7%B8%AE%E5%9C%96.png)
智易AVC越南製造中心通過RBA VAP（Validated Audit Process）稽核，於2024年5月獲頒白金級證書的最高榮耀。
RBA責任商業聯盟（Responsible Business Alliance）前身為EICC 電子行業公民聯盟（Electronic Industry Citizenship Coalition），是全球工業供應鏈中的最大的企業社會責任聯盟。RBA行為準則（Code of Conduct）旨在保護供應鏈中的勞工，確保其工作環境的安全、有尊嚴且受尊重的工作，並確保供應商營運符合環保規範與商業道德。RBA VAP稽核依循人權、健康安全、環境、道德規範、管理系統五大構面，評核企業於企業社會責任的績效表現。
智易遵循國際勞動相關人權規範，訂定「智易人權政策宣言」，推動人權風險管理，定期進行風險鑑別、預防及改善，保障員工的勞動人權。智易總部與AVC越南製造中心皆取得ISO 45001職業安全衛生管理系統及ISO 14001環境管理系統認證，並每年進行溫室氣體盤查與監控。營運方面，智易秉持誠信經營理念，建立良好之公司治理與風險控管機制，從「政策制定」、「教育訓練」、「預防防範」以及「申訴舉報」四面向落實誠信經營管理。本次RBA VAP稽核獲評滿分的白金評級，展現智易集團對員工、環境與商業道德等社會責任的重視。
智易將持續依循RBA行為準則與利害關係人期待，落實企業社會責任，並帶動價值鏈夥伴，推行供應商發展計畫，強化上下游供應鏈的風險管理與韌性。

# 智易 榮獲國家永續發展獎
2023 / 11 / 30 
![智易 榮獲國家永續發展獎](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/JR6_1137.JPG)
智易於11月30日獲頒112年國家永續發展獎，由行政院院長陳建仁頒獎，智易副總經理熊念哲代表受獎。
國家永續發展獎由台灣行政院國家永續發展委員會主辦，以表揚推動永續發展績效卓越的單位。從眾多參賽的機關團體中脫穎而出，顯示智易永續發展的策略及成效獲得國家級獎項肯定。
智易以「藉由網路創造未來更美好的生活」為願景，訂定共存、共榮、共好（Equilibrium，Prosperity & Inclusivity， EPI）三大永續主軸，並延伸出「綠色設計」、「永續採購」、「氣候行動」、「誠信治理」、「勞工人權」、「多元包容」、「偏鄉教育」與「弱勢扶助」等八大面向，呼應臺灣永續發展目標與臺灣2050淨零排放路徑及策略。
響應全球氣候行動，智易於2022年簽署SBTi科學基礎減量目標倡議。近年來持續從產品設計、原物料採購和生產製造等面向強化永續的推動。包含持續提升產品 PCR (Post-consumer Recycled) 回收塑料的應用占比，並評估環境衝擊較低的生質材料循環應用；擴大廠區太陽能系統設置，加速轉型低碳商業模式；購買再生能源憑證，提升再生能源使用佔比。除了身體力行外，智易發揮企業永續影響力，於2023年推出「Go Green with Arcadyan」專案，系統化協助供應鏈夥伴進行組織型溫室氣體盤查及產品碳足跡減量計畫，帶領供應鏈朝向綠色低碳轉型。
2023年是智易永續成果豐碩的一年，同年共獲得第16屆TCSA台灣企業永續獎「台灣100大永續典範企業獎」及「企業永續報告獎－銀級」雙獎殊榮，以及第四屆臺灣循環經濟獎「產品傑出獎」的肯定。

# 智易永續績效再創高峰，連續三年榮獲「TCSA台灣100大永續典範企業獎」
2025 / 11 / 26 
![智易永續績效再創高峰，連續三年榮獲「TCSA台灣100大永續典範企業獎」](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/IMG_1538.jpg)
智易於2025年**TCSA 台灣企業永續獎** （Taiwan Corporate Sustainability Awards）榮獲「台灣 100 大永續典範企業獎」與「永續報告金獎」兩項大獎，展現智易在環境永續、社會共融與公司治理三大面向的長期承諾與卓越成果，再度獲得國內最具指標性永續評選機制的高度肯定。
**TCSA 台灣企業永續獎** 由台灣永續能源研究基金會主辦，依據環境、社會與治理（ESG）國際標準進行專業評選，包括永續治理、氣候行動、供應鏈管理、利害關係人溝通等多項構面，堪稱台灣企業 ESG 實踐最具公信力的獎項之一。
**榮獲百大永續典範企業：全方位落實環境、社會與治理承諾**
智易長期推動環境永續與低碳轉型，持續建置節能流程、提升能源使用效率及實現SBTi 科學基礎減量目標，並落實供應鏈 ESG 管理，帶動合作夥伴共同精進。有關永續治理及社會面向，智易推動友善職場、安全健康環境、多元平等與人才發展，並積極投入社會共融、教育支持與公益活動等專案，獲評審肯定。
**永續報告獲金獎肯定：資訊透明、完整揭露 ESG 成效**
智易2024年永續報告書秉持高度透明原則，全面揭露公司在 **ESG 四大面向** 之政策、治理架構、風險管理、重大性議題鑑別與年度績效，並同步與國際準則接軌。同時建置專屬 ESG 官網，強化利害關係人溝通機制與資訊可及性，符合 TCSA 對於「資訊揭露完整性、可信度與溝通性」的評選要求。
展望未來，智易將持續以永續為核心驅動力，透過科技創新與負責任營運，與全球夥伴共同促進綠色轉型、擴大社會正面影響力，實踐企業永續的願景。

# 智易連續兩年獲選商周「碳競爭力100強」企業
2025 / 11 / 21 
![智易連續兩年獲選商周「碳競爭力100強」企業](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E7%B0%A1%E5%A0%B12.JPG)
智易於2025年連續兩年榮獲《商業周刊》碳競爭力100強企業殊榮。「碳競爭力」為國內首創以「碳」為評比核心的企業評選，以企業公開數據涵蓋：碳排減少率、碳生產力成長率、減碳承諾度、決策層級及範疇三碳排揭露等關鍵指標，全面檢視企業減碳行動的深度與廣度。
面對全球淨零碳排趨勢，智易將減碳融入企業核心策略。台灣總部與越南生產中心均建立能源與碳排系統化管理，於2023年啟動「Go Green with Arcadyan」專案，邀請供應商導入碳盤查與減碳目標，全年範疇三減碳達95,302噸CO₂e。產品端導入再生塑料與電源智慧管理技術，有效降低產品能耗20%至30%，材料利用率提升至85%，2025年目標為75%客戶產品採用再生塑膠。智易以節能、循環與協同三大策略並進，打造從製造端到市場端的綠色競爭力，成為電子製造業低碳創新的代表企業。
智易從競爭激烈、近千家上市企業的評選中脫穎而出，再次獲選2025年碳競爭力前100強，印證智易在永續轉型、減碳行動與治理管理領域的優異表現，不僅是對智易減碳努力的肯定，更彰顯智易對環境責任的堅定承諾與實際行動力。展望未來，智易將持續整合資源，推動創新減碳措施，致力開發環境友善產品，攜手共建永續未來。
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/11/21/image.png)
資料來源: [商周2025碳競爭力百強名單](https://www.businessweekly.com.tw/Event/Carbon-competitiveness/2025List100/) & [商周2025碳競爭力百強名單_ 智易](https://www.businessweekly.com.tw/event/site/campaign/TopCompanies?CampaignID=3068)

# 智易榮獲114年度「企業永續報告揭露職業健康與安全績效主動評比」 TOP 10% 績優企業
2025 / 10 / 31 
![智易榮獲114年度「企業永續報告揭露職業健康與安全績效主動評比」 TOP 10% 績優企業](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E6%8A%95%E5%BD%B1%E7%89%871_UvFvg55.JPG)
智易榮獲勞動部職業安全衛生署114年度「企業永續報告揭露職業健康與安全績效主動評比」**績優企業** 的肯定。該評比依據勞動部「[企業永續報告書揭露職業健康與安全績效主動評比實施計畫](https://www.osha.gov.tw/media/efqph5d1/114%E5%B9%B4%E4%BC%81%E6%A5%AD%E6%B0%B8%E7%BA%8C%E5%A0%B1%E5%91%8A%E5%85%AC%E9%96%8B%E8%81%B7%E6%A5%AD%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E8%88%87%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E7%B8%BE%E6%95%88%E4%B8%BB%E5%8B%95%E8%A9%95%E6%AF%94%E5%AF%A6%E6%96%BD%E8%A8%88%E7%95%AB.pdf)」辦理，評核企業於永續報告中對健康與安全議題的揭露深度、治理架構、管理成效與創新作為。在永續報告中，智易不僅系統性揭露安全健康績效指標、風險管理架構與改善成效，更配合評比要求，強化治理架構與員工參與，涵蓋四大面向：安全、健康、幸福與人才發展，於眾多參評企業中脫穎而出，名列**全國前****10%****績優企業** 。
智易自2005年推動ISO 45001職業安全衛生管理系統，憑藉完善的安全管理制度、透明的職安資訊揭露，以及員工健康促進與風險預防措施，此獎項展現智易將「以人為本、安全共榮」落實於永續經營的核心價值，彰顯智易在職場健康與安全揭露、治理與實踐的持續精進。未來，智易將持續提升安全管理效能，並強化供應鏈職安治理，共同推動永續發展。

# 智易榮獲 JAC 2025 年度 SEP (Supplier Engagement Programme) 氣候銀獎及氣候承諾認證
2025 / 10 / 27 
![智易榮獲 JAC 2025 年度 SEP \(Supplier Engagement Programme\) 氣候銀獎及氣候承諾認證](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/JAC%E7%8D%8E%E7%89%8C_7.png)
智易於Joint Alliance for CSR（JAC）的「Scope 3 Supplier Engagement Programme（SEP）」評選，獲頒 **Silver Climate Award** ，並取得 **Committed to Climate Badge** 認證。根據 JAC[官網資訊](https://jointallianceforcsr.org/supplier-engagement-programme-supplier-recognition/)，此次評選涵蓋 734 家 ICT 供應商，根據「**策略** 」、「**測量、報告和核查** 」、「**減排** 」及「**溝通與參與** 」四大維度評估其碳排放管理成熟度。
智易深知在全球氣候變遷背景下，供應鏈碳排放（尤其 Scope 3）為企業永續管理關鍵之一。以本次評選為契機，智易聚焦以下關鍵行動：
  * 制定並強化碳管理策略，推動「**Go Green with Arcadyan** 」專案，納入供應鏈合作夥伴。
  * 建立量測、報告與驗證管理系統 (MRV)，確保碳排放數據透明透及可靠性。
  * 實踐減碳舉措，包括產品生命週期減碳、物流及製造流程優化。
  * 積極與供應商、產業協作、利害關係人展開溝通，共同推動淨零減碳目標。


透過上述行動，智易JAC SEP 成熟度模型評估中取得優異成績，顯示智易對氣候議題承諾及具體行動獲外部肯定。智易將繼續將碳管理融入營運核心，深化供應鏈夥伴合作，並以科學為基礎設定減碳目標（SBTi）與行動路徑。智易期待未來在供應鏈減碳、產品創新、永續發展上帶來更大影響，為客戶、投資人與社會創造共贏。
**關於****JAC Scope 3 Supplier Engagement Programme (SEP)****：**  
JAC SEP 為一項針對 ICT 產業 Tier 1 供應鏈的重要永續參與計畫，以供應商碳排放為核心，透過成熟度評估、教育訓練及分段認證，協助供應商提升碳管理能力。
資料來源: [Supplier Engagement Programme Supplier Recognition - Joint Alliance for CSR](https://jointallianceforcsr.org/supplier-engagement-programme-supplier-recognition/)

# 智易表揚卓越供應商 攜手推動永續發展
2025 / 10 / 14 
![智易表揚卓越供應商 攜手推動永續發展](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/supplier.jpg)
智易持續深化永續經營與責任供應鏈管理，頒發「優良供應商」及「最佳減碳」兩大獎項，表彰11家表現卓越的合作夥伴。獲獎供應商在智易主導的ESG現場稽核、交貨品質、服務表現、客戶JAC稽核及「Go Green with Arcadyan」減碳專案等面向皆展現出色的成果。
永續發展是智易競爭力的核心，透過表揚優秀夥伴，不僅肯定供應商的努力與貢獻，更期望激勵合作夥伴持續在技術創新、品質精進、服務優化及環境減碳等方面追求卓越。
未來，智易將持續秉持「共榮共好，永續前行」的理念，積極落實企業社會責任，並攜手供應商夥伴全力以赴，共同為環境保護與永續發展努力，打造具韌性、責任與永續價值的供應鏈。

# 智易越南製造中心榮獲 JAC 2025 年度永續稽核銀牌供應商獎
2025 / 07 / 25 
![智易越南製造中心榮獲 JAC 2025 年度永續稽核銀牌供應商獎](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/high_res_award_image.jpg)
在國際電信產業聯盟（Joint Alliance for CSR, JAC）2025 年最新「永續稽核供應商評比」中，**智易越南製造中心（****AVC****）榮獲銀牌供應商獎** 。此項榮譽彰顯智易在企業社會責任（CSR）、供應鏈管理，以及環境、社會與治理（ESG）實踐上的卓越表現。
智易自 2016 年加入 JAC 供應商輔導計畫以來，積極推動製造中心落實 CSR 準則，並將永續管理機制正式納入供應商合約條款，透過透明且嚴謹的審查制度，持續推動供應鏈改善與風險管理，展現高度的管理成熟度與責任承諾。
智易越南製造中心不僅在 2025 年榮獲 JAC 銀牌評級，更於 2024 年取得 Responsible Business Alliance（RBA）白金級認證，肯定其在勞工權益、道德經營與環境保護上的領導地位，也展現智易在全球供應鏈永續經營上的深厚實力。
展望未來，智易將持續整合 JAC 與 RBA 等國際評估標準，深化供應商管理機制，攜手全球供應鏈夥伴建置負責任且具韌性的永續價值鏈。
資料來源: [https://jointallianceforcsr.org/jac-introduces-audit-rating-supplier-awards/](https://jointallianceforcsr.org/jac-introduces-audit-rating-supplier-awards/)
**關於****JAC**
JAC（Joint Alliance for CSR）是由全球 31 家主要電信營運商於 2010 年共同成立的非營利性聯盟，致力於促進透過協同合作，確保**資訊與通訊技術產業（****ICT****）** 供應鏈在**勞工權益、環境保護、健康安全** 與**道德經營** 方面符合國際**永續發展** 標準，並透過標準化稽核制度及獎勵機制，提升供應鏈整體永續表現。
###### [智易表揚卓越供應商 攜手推動永續發展 ](https://csr.arcadyan.com/zh-hant/news/44/) ###### [智易榮登《金融時報》2025 亞太氣候領袖榜首 積極減碳推升國際永續影響力 ](https://csr.arcadyan.com/zh-hant/news/42/)

#  Corporate News 
* * *
## [Focused on Sustainability, Arcadyan is Awarded the Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award in 2023 Hsinchu, November 15, 2023 - The Taiwan Institute for Sustainable Energy (TAISE) encourages the industry to prioritize corporate sustainability development. Annually, it organizes the "Taiwan Corporate Sustainability Awards," evaluating companies based on their corporate sustainability reports and sustainability comprehensive performance. Arcadyan Technology Corporation, represented by General Manager Edward Tseng, received the "Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award" and the "Corporate Sustainability Reports Award - Silver Level" at today's award ceremony. The Taiwan Corporate Sustainability Awards (TCSA) selection event, now on its sixteenth year, attracted a record-high 526 participating companies this year, bringing the cumulative total to 731 companies over the years. This represents 80% of the market value of listed companies in Taiwan, underscoring the increasing focus on sustainable development across various sectors. Representing the company, Edward Tseng, General Manager of Arcadyan Technology Corporation, accepts the "Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award" and the "Corporate Sustainability Reports Award - Silver Level" at the Taiwan Top 100 Sustainable Exemplary Enterprises Award ceremony. Arcadyan Technology Corporation, with the vision of "Creating a better future through the internet" for its corporate sustainability development, has established three major sustainability axes: Equilibrium, Prosperity & Inclusivity (EPI). Since 2020, Arcadyan has adopted the BS 8001 circular economy standard, adhering to ecological design and practicing the 10R concept of the circular economy from product design and manufacturing to disposal and recycling. This approach aims to minimize material waste by actively utilizing Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) recyclable materials, reducing component usage, facilitating easy disassembly and recycling, extending product life cycles, and designing products that conserve energy, thereby significantly reducing carbon emissions in the manufacturing process. The long-term commitment to green product design has yielded results. This year, Arcadyan has also been honored with the "SEAL Sustainable Product Award" from the international environmental sustainability organization SEAL. Additionally, it received recognition from the Chung-Hua Institution for Economic Research and the Center for Green Economy, which conferred the "Circular Economy Award - Outstanding Product Award" in acknowledgment of its achievements in circular economy practices. Arcadyan responds to global climate action by signing the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) in 2022, establishing specific short-term carbon reduction and long-term net-zero targets. The Taiwan headquarters and global manufacturing centers conduct an annual organizational greenhouse gas inventory based on ISO 14064. In the previous year, the Taiwan headquarters and the production center in Vietnam implemented the ISO 50001 energy management system, effectively enhancing the energy efficiency of the facilities. Moreover, the production center in Vietnam has installed a high-power output solar photovoltaic system within the industrial park, with plans to continuously expand its scale over the next 2-3 years, significantly increasing the utilization of renewable energy. The Taiwan headquarters is also set to complete the construction of a solar power generation system by 2026. In terms of green supply chain initiatives, Arcadyan actively promotes a supplier CSR guidance program through the "Go Green with Arcadyan" initiative, systematically assisting suppliers in conducting organizational greenhouse gas inventories and developing product carbon footprint reduction plans. About Arcadyan Founded in 2003, Arcadyan Technology specializes in broadband, multimedia, wireless and network communications. Arcadyan focuses on the research and development in wireless communications and 4G/5G high-speed network devices and combines the voice and multimedia technologies in order to provide diversified solutions for a digital home, mobile broadband system and multimedia over the wireless network.  more... ](https://www.arcadyan.com/en-us/news/3/44/)

###  永續發展管理 
####  Sustainability Development 
# Sustainability Governance
To strengthen corporate sustainability governance, Arcadyan established the CSR Committee in 2016 and upgraded it in 2020 to the Sustainability Development Committee, reporting directly to the Board of Directors. Chaired by the President and composed of senior cross departmental executives, the committee formulates sustainability strategies and mediumto long-term plans. In May 2022, the Board approved the "Sustainability Development Committee Charter", defining it as a cross-functional communication platform responsible for:
  * Set sustainability policies.
  * Plan annual strategic directions and action plans.
  * Monitor and review execution outcomes, reporting to the Board.
  * Decide on other major sustainability matters.


Arcadyan's Board of Directors regularly reviews sustainability progress to ensure alignment with business operations and provides guidance when needed. In 2024, three Sustainability Development Committee meetings were held, with updates reported to the Board. To enhance execution, a dedicated Sustainability Development Office was established to drive ESG initiatives and integrate them into daily operations.
  1. Reviewed 2023 sustainability performance and approved 2024 goals and plans.
  2. Net-zero targets approved by the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi), aligning with the 1.5℃ pathway.
  3. Advanced energy transition by completing Phase II solar installation at the Vietnam plant and planning annual renewable energy certificate purchases.
  4. Increased use of recycled plastics and packaging to support circular product design.
  5. Enhanced sustainability data management to improve disclosure accuracy and reliability.
  6. Linked senior management compensation to sustainability performance to strengthen accountability.
  7. Received EcoVadis Platinum rating, recognizing excellence in corporate social responsibility


![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/23/image-20250923180043-1.png)
Starting in 2024, Arcadyan has integrated sustainability-related indicators into the performance targets of executive management. Linking executive compensation with sustainability performance aims to encourage leaders to prioritize corporate sustainability goals. Arcadyan evaluates the involvement and contributions of executive management to company operations and reviews the compensation system in response to external factors and regulatory changes. The President determines the allocation of executive compensation based on the achievement of performance targets and reports to the Chairman. Final decisions are made by the Remuneration Committee and the Board of Directors.
The performance target allocation for Arcadyan’s executive management is as follows:

###  永續發展管理 
####  Sustainability Development 
# Material Topics
Arcadyan conducts an annual materiality assessment following the GRI Universal Standards 2021 (GRI 3: Material Topics), employing a double materiality approach. The process evaluates both environmental and social impacts of operations and their potential effects on business performance. The 2024 results were third-party verified and approved by the Board of Directors, forming the basis for this report's disclosures and sustainability targets, ensuring alignment between strategy and operations.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/24/image-20250924105647-1.png)
Arcadyan applies a double materiality analysis, evaluating both "stakeholder concern" and "sustainability impact" to address external expectations and the company's actual influence on sustainable development:
  * **Stakeholder Concern:** Arcadyan surveyed eight key stakeholder groups to assess ESG topic relevance, collecting 306 responses with a response rate over 95%. Respondents included shareholders (46), customers (35), employees (80), suppliers (93), government agencies (21), non-profits (16), community (1), and business partners (14).  

  * **Sustainability Impact:** Arcadyan engaged 19 members from the Sustainability Implementation Team to assess impacts across the supply chain, operations, and product use. The evaluation covered positive and negative effects on the economy, environment, and society, considering both actual and potential impacts. A five-point scale was used for quantitative scoring.


Based on the double materiality matrix, Arcadyan identified 15 key sustainability topics with both high stakeholder concern and significant impact. In the economic dimension, these include **business performance, integrity and anti-corruption, regulatory compliance, technology and R &D, customer service management, business continuity and geopolitical issues (combined), information security, and supply chain management.** Environmental topics cover **green products, circular economy, energy and resource management, and climate change and carbon management.** In the social dimension, **human rights and equality, labor/management relations, and occupational health and safety** were identified. Compared to 2023, three new topics were added: business continuity and geopolitical issues, labor/management relations, and occupational health and safety. 
The identified material topics align with 17 GRI Sustainability Reporting Standards and 2 Arcadyan-specific topics, forming the core structure of this report. Based on these topics, responsible departments set 35 short-term, medium, and long-term sustainability goals, with progress regularly reviewed by the Sustainability Implementation Team and reported to the Board. For non-material topics, relevant policies, actions, and outcomes are also disclosed to present a comprehensive view of Arcadyan's sustainability governance.

####  Integrity Management 
# Corporate Governance
Arcadyan upholds the core values of integrity in governance and operational transparency. In accordance with the "Company Act", "Securities and Exchange Act", and other relevant regulations, Arcadyan established its articles of incorporation, governance framework, and operational rules to continuously enhance corporate governance practices. The board of directors is Arcadyan 's highest governance body, chaired by the chairperson, and formulates the "[Board of Directors Meeting Rules](https://www.arcadyan.com/media/investor/cg/regulations/%E8%91%A3%E4%BA%8B%E6%9C%83%E8%AD%B0%E4%BA%8B%E8%A6%8F%E7%AF%84_1130222.pdf)" to implement the effective execution of the board's responsibilities. The board of directors holds a meeting at least once a quarter, and its main responsibilities include:
  * Guiding the strategic direction of the Company
  * Appointing and supervising the management team
  * Evaluating operational performance and assessing risk impacts
  * Preventing conflicts of interest 
  * Ensuring legal compliance and protecting shareholder rights


In terms of board composition and election, Arcadyan adopts a candidate nomination system in accordance with the "[Director Election Rules](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Procedures_for_Election_of_Directors.pdf)" and reviews candidate qualifications in accordance with the "[Corporate Governance Code of Practice](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/%E6%99%BA%E6%98%93%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E6%B2%BB%E7%90%86%E5%AF%A6%E5%8B%99%E5%AE%88%E5%89%87.pdf)" and elected by the shareholders. The current Board comprises nine directors, including three independent directors and one female director, strengthening gender diversity and professional balance. All directors serve a three-year term, with the current term commencing on June 15, 2023. The average age of board members ranges from 60 to 69 years, and the number of directors concurrently serving as company managers does not exceed one-third of the total board, in compliance with corporate governance regulations. By enhancing the board's competencies and promoting diversity in its composition, Arcadyan is committed to establishing a governance structure that embodies both professionalism and transparency, guiding Arcadyan toward stable operations and sustainable growth.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/24/image-20250924133639-1.png)
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/24/image-20250924135914-1.png)
#### Board Performance Evaluation and Remuneration Policy
To fulfill the responsibilities of the Board and enhance governance effectiveness, Arcadyan conducts annual internal self-evaluations in accordance with the "[Board and Functional Committees Performance Evaluation Policy](https://www.arcadyan.com/media/investor/cg/regulations/%E8%91%A3%E4%BA%8B%E6%9C%83%E6%9A%A8%E5%8A%9F%E8%83%BD%E6%80%A7%E5%A7%94%E5%93%A1%E6%9C%83%E7%B8%BE%E6%95%88%E8%A9%95%E4%BC%B0%E8%BE%A6%E6%B3%95_1120801.pdf)" and commissions external evaluations from professional institutions or academic expert teams every three years. In 2024, the internal evaluation covered the entire Board, each functional committee, and individual Directors, with overall results reaching "significantly exceeding standards," demonstrating the Board's effective performance.
Arcadyan director's remuneration system is implemented in line with [Arcadyan's Articles of Association](https://www.arcadyan.com/media/investor/cg/regulations/%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E7%AB%A0%E7%A8%8B_20250528.pdf). If a profit is made each year, a maximum of 2% of pre-tax net profit, calculated before the deduction of employee and director compensation, will be allocated as director compensation. The actual amount will be determined based on Arcadyan's overall performance, the director's contribution, and industry benchmarks. It is reviewed by the Remuneration Committee and submitted to the Board of Directors for approval.
Compensation for senior executives, such as the Chairman, General Manager, and Deputy General Manager, is determined in accordance with Arcadyan's compensation policy, considering individual's job level, professional competence, educational background, and responsibilities, and are further linked to performance evaluations based on both financial and nonfinancial indicators. The compensation structure consists of 70% financial indicators—such as individual performance achievement and contributions to operation performance; and 30% nonfinancial indicators—such as project leadership, compliance performance, and internal control effectiveness. This ensures that the compensation structure is aligned with Arcadyan's long-term sustainability goals. Arcadyan is committed to regularly reviewing  
and optimizing its executive remuneration policy in response to actual business performance and evolving regulatory trends. For detailed information on remuneration, please refer to "[Arcadyan 2024 Annual Report](https://www.arcadyan.com/media/investor/shm/annual-report/2024_Annual_Report.pdf)".

#####  [ News ](https://csr.arcadyan.com/en-us/news/)

####  Integrity Management 
# Business Ethics
Arcadyan upholds the core value of integrity in business operations, establishing a robust corporate governance and risk control framework. Through policy formulation, training, preventive measures, and whistleblowing channels, Arcadyan fully implements integrity management to ensure all business activities are conducted legally and in compliance, thereby strengthening corporate resilience and sustainability.
#### Policy Formulation
In accordance with the "Ethical Corporate Management Best Practice Principles for TWSE/TPEx Listed Companies," Arcadyan has formulated and disclosed the "[Ethical Corporate Management Principle](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Ethical_Corporate_Management_Principles.pdf)", "[Procedures for Ethical Management and Guidelines for Conduct](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Procedures_for_Ethical_Management_and_Guidelines_for_Conduct.pdf)", and the "Code of Conduct for Directors and Managers", all approved by the Board of Directors. In addition, the "[Business Ethics Policy](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Arcadyan_Technology_Business_Ethics_Policy.pdf)" is stipulated in the personnel management regulations, clearly demonstrating Arcadyan's commitment to ethical operations. To enforce high standards of ethical risk prevention, Arcadyan explicitly prohibits the following activities:
  1. Prohibition of bribery and accepting bribes
  2. Prohibition of providing illegal political donations
  3. Prohibition of inappropriate charitable donations or sponsorships
  4. Prohibition of unreasonable gifts, hospitality, or other improper benefits
  5. Prohibition of intellectual property infringement
  6. Prohibition of engaging in unfair competitive practices
  7. Prevention of harm to stakeholders from products or services


In 2024, Arcadyan received a whistleblowing case related to integrity or corruption. Internal investigation found no material violations. Arcadyan was not involved in any litigation or penalties related to corruption, bribery, fraud, insider trading, anticompetitive behavior, antitrust, monopoly, or market manipulation—demonstrating Arcadyan's effective governance and legal compliance.
#### Training and Awareness
To cultivate a strong culture of ethical conduct, Arcadyan established the Employee Code of Conduct in 2007, which was comprehensively revised in 2021 as the "[Business Ethics Policy](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Arcadyan_Technology_Business_Ethics_Policy.pdf)". The policy covers key topics such as integrity, prevention of conflicts of interest, rules on gifts and hospitality, use of resources, protection of intellectual property and confidential information, fair trade, and anti-money laundering measures. Arcadyan requires all employees to avoid conducting business transactions with parties that have records of unethical conduct. Any such cases must be promptly reported and business relationships terminated to protect Arcadyan's reputation and stakeholder trust. For severe violations of integrity, disciplinary measures—up to dismissal—are enforced in accordance with applicable laws and Arcadyan's personnel regulations.
The "[Business Ethics Policy](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Arcadyan_Technology_Business_Ethics_Policy.pdf)" is incorporated into new employee orientation, and all staff are required to participate annually in the "Company-wide Awareness Training," which covers business ethics, the Code of Ethical Conduct, risk management, insider trading prevention, and handling of material information. In 2024, a total of 3,534 participants completed the training, with a completion rate of 95.5%. In addition, targeted external training sessions were provided for Board members, corporate governance officers, internal auditors, and relevant functional units, enhancing their expertise in integrity-related regulations, financial systems, information security, and internal control. In 2024, these specialized programs accumulated a total of 90 training hours.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925170424-1.png)
#### Prevention and Control Measures
To effectively prevent fraud, corruption, and unethical conduct, Arcadyan has established a comprehensive internal control system and, in line with the risk management process, continuously monitors and reviews risks related to ethical business operations. Integrity governance is incorporated into the annual audit plan, with the Audit Office responsible for overseeing policy implementation and reporting regularly to the Board of Directors to ensure the effectiveness and transparency of the management mechanisms.
The Finance and Accounting Department implements a regular job rotation system to enhance operational flexibility and reduce the risk of collusion. For high-value transactions or operational processes with significant decision-making impact, Arcadyan follows the Four-eye Principle, introducing multiple layers of review, functional segregation, and cross-checking to strengthen internal control design and ensure the legitimacy and prudence of major operational decisions. Since the establishment of the Risk Management Task Force in 2022, Arcadyan has conducted systematic risk identification and assessment across business activities. In 2024, high-risk ethical business issues identified included anti-corruption and fair competition, with a focus on hospitality, money laundering, bribery, fraud, and unfair trade. Arcadyan assessed the likelihood and potential impact of these risks and, to strengthen behavioral standards and control measures in highrisk functions, conducted a Due Diligence Integrity Survey. In 2024, a total of 84 high-risk personnel—including senior management, sales, procurement, and finance staff—completed the anti-corruption questionnaire, committing not to offer or accept bribes, kickbacks, cash, or other improper benefits that could influence decision-making, and to refrain from any form of improper business dealings. The survey achieved a 100% response rate, with no incidents of unethical conduct, corruption, or other violations detected.
#### Anti-Competitive Behavior
Arcadyan upholds the principles of integrity management in accordance with the "[Ethical Corporate Management Principle](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Ethical_Corporate_Management_Principles.pdf)" and the "[Business Ethics Policy](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Arcadyan_Technology_Business_Ethics_Policy.pdf)", complying with competition laws and fair trade regulations in all jurisdictions where it operates. Arcadyan prohibits any form of unfair competition, including but not limited to price-fixing, bid-rigging, production or quota restrictions, market or clients' allocation, and other activities that undermine fair market competition. Arcadyan also strictly prohibits the improper acquisition or misuse of patents, trade secrets, and confidential information, including the theft of patent information, unauthorized use of counterparties' trade data, or inducing current or former employees to disclose confidential information from previous employers. Arcadyan is committed to protecting the rights and dignity of all parties in business interactions and adheres to the principles of integrity, transparency, and fairness in dealing with clients, suppliers, competitors, and employees. Employees are prohibited from manipulating information, abusing authority, concealing facts, or using any other illegal means to gain benefits for themselves or third parties.
Arcadyan has established reporting and handling mechanisms that encourage internal and external stakeholders to report any dishonest or improper conduct. Once any employee is found to be involved in unethical behavior, the case is immediately reported to the relevant supervisor, with appropriate measures taken. Where necessary, the matter is reported to competent authorities or judicial bodies, underscoring Arcadyan's commitment to anti-corruption and fair competition. In 2024, Arcadyan had no legal actions, litigation, or penalties related to anti-competitive, anti-trust, or monopoly regulations, demonstrating the effectiveness of its integrity governance and legal compliance.
#### Supplier Integrity Due Diligence
Suppliers are key partners in Arcadyan's promotion of integrity management and the enforcement of business ethics. To build a transparent and fair supply chain, Arcadyan requires all suppliers to sign the "[Arcadyan Supplier CSR commitment"](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/resources/documents/Arcadyan_Supplier_CSR_commitment.pdf), which clearly stipulates adherence to principles prohibiting bribery, illegal donations, gifts, and other improper benefits. Suppliers are also required to promote anti-corruption awareness and provide training to their employees and agents, while encouraging the reporting of any potential corrupt practices.
To strengthen integrity governance across the supply chain, Arcadyan conducts an annual "Anti-corruption Due Diligence Questionnaire" investigation for medium and high risk suppliers based on supplier evaluation results, to identify potential risks of bribery, improper gifts, hospitality, or other transfers of benefits. In 2024, a total of forty-one suppliers underwent the assessment, with a 100% questionnaire completion rate. The results revealed no instances of violations of business ethics, kickbacks, acceptance of cash, or inappropriate hospitality. Arcadyan will continue to enhance supply chain integrity risk management through due diligence and transparent evaluation processes.
#### Whistleblowing and Reporting Mechanism
Arcadyan fosters a corporate culture of integrity and transparency by establishing a dedicated whistleblowing channel, the Integrity Reporting Mailbox ([ethics@arcadyan.com](http://ethics@arcadyan.com)), for employees and external stakeholders to report dishonest or improper conduct. Arcadyan is committed to protecting the confidentiality of whistleblowers' identities and the content of reports during the investigation process and prohibits any form of retaliation. For anonymous reports, Arcadyan does not disclose original documents or copies, nor does it conduct handwriting identification or unauthorized external review. If internal investigation procedures confirm the occurrence of misconduct, Arcadyan will take strict actions in accordance with the law and, when necessary, notify judicial or anti-corruption authorities, demonstrating a zero-tolerance stance against corruption.
In 2024, Arcadyan received one report related to integrity or corruption. After internal investigation, no material violations were found. Aside from this case, there were no incidents in which Arcadyan violated integrity management or anticorruption regulations that resulted in penalties from competent authorities, indicating that Arcadyan's integrity governance mechanisms operate effectively and its risk control measures remain robust.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925171956-2.png)
#### Political Contributions
Arcadyan strictly adheres to the principle of political neutrality and has not engaged in any political party activities, political donations, or lobbying during its operations. In 2024, Arcadyan had no record of any political contributions. Arcadyan also respects employees' individual civic rights and encourages them to actively participate in democratic processes, such as voting or supporting candidates and public issues they believe in, thereby demonstrating Arcadyan's commitment to social engagement and respect for individual freedoms.

####  Integrity Management 
# Information Security Management
#### Information Security System Establishment and Management
Both Arcadyan headquarters and its Vietnam Manufacturing Center have certified for ISO 27001 Information Security Management System and ISO 27005 Information Risk Management, demonstrating the Arcadyan's commitment to institutionalizing information security and aligning with international standards. To further strengthen data leakage prevention, Arcadyan has implemented a Data Loss Prevention (DLP) mechanism, strictly regulating the use of high-risk channels such as communication software and external storage devices. Additionally, Arcadyan has enhanced its mobile device usage policies to comprehensively improve its resilience and response capabilities in information security, ensuring the protection of clients' confidentiality, personal data, and intellectual property.
**ISO 27001 Information Security Policy**
  * Ensure the confidentiality of information related to the business of the Company to prevent breaches or losses of the Company's sensitive information and individual data.
  * Ensure the completeness and availability of the Company's business information to perform the operation and various business of the Company correctly.


###### Information Security Management Framework
To enhance corporate information security governance, Arcadyan has established the Information Security Management Committee as Arcadyan's highest decision-making and management body for cybersecurity. This committee is responsible for formulating information security strategies and allocating resources accordingly. Led by senior management, the committee appoints an Information Security Management Representative (a designated specialist) to oversee daily operations and ensure effective implementation.
Under the committee, three dedicated working groups have been established: the Document Editing Team, the Risk Management and Evaluation Team, and the Internal Audit Team. These teams are respectively responsible for the development and maintenance of information security documentation, risk assessments and control measures, and internal audits with corrective action tracking—together forming a comprehensive governance mechanism. The Information Security Management Representative provides regular reports to the committee every six months, covering management performance, emerging issues, and strategic directions. This ensures that the overall information security system remains compliant, relevant, and effective on a continual basis. The Information Security Management Representative provides regular reports to the committee every six months, covering management performance, emerging issues, and strategic directions. This ensures that the overall information security system remains compliant, relevant, and effective on a continual basis.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925174148-1.png)
#### Information Security Management Mechanism
To ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of its information assets, Arcadyan has established internal control mechanisms and an information security documentation system in line with the ISO 27001 Information Security Management Systems. Arcadyan continually strengthens its risk response capabilities by conducting regular internal and external security audits. These audits include risk grading and vulnerability scanning of process-related databases, as well as regular updates to the information asset inventory. To enhance operational resilience, Arcadyan implements a range of control measures such as Business Impact Analysis (BIA), disaster recovery drills, account permission reviews, firewall configuration audits, cybersecurity training, penetration testing, management review meetings, and unannounced social engineering simulations. These efforts ensure the continuous improvement of Arcadyan 's information security defense systems. Since 2020, Arcadyan has maintained cyber insurance coverage to mitigate the potential financial risks of information security incidents. In 2024, the insured amount reached USD 3 million, demonstrating Arcadyan's strong commitment and forwardlooking approach to information security risk management.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925174521-2.png)
###### Information Security Awareness and Training
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925174651-3.png)
#### Prevention of Unauthorized Third-Party Access or Disclosure of Information
To comprehensively safeguard Arcadyan's and clients' information assets and prevent the risk of unauthorized third-party access or data leakage, Arcadyan has established a multi-layered information security control mechanism. This mechanism extends from core account management to mobile device and network usage, reinforcing access control and minimizing the risk of unauthorized access. The key control measures are as follows:
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/25/image-20250925174814-4.png)
###### Information Data Retention and Management
Arcadyan has established a comprehensive mechanism for information data retention and log management to ensure complete traceability of data access activities. All servers and database systems are equipped with logging functions and defined retention periods. System logs are retained for at least one year, while logs from firewalls and core switches are preserved for no less than three months. Depending on applicable laws and regulations, contractual obligations, and practical needs, relevant records may be retained for extended periods to support investigations and audits related to information security incidents.
All access records across Arcadyan's operations are strictly controlled to prevent unauthorized tampering, deletion, or leakage. To mitigate the risks of misuse from idle accounts, all critical systems are equipped with auto-logout functions, and user access rights are regularly reviewed and audited. Additionally, the effectiveness of Arcadyan's information security management system is continually assessed through both internal and external audits.
Regarding information asset management, Arcadyan conducts risk assessments and applies appropriate control measures based on asset sensitivity and risk characteristics. Retention periods for third-party data are also clearly defined to minimize the risk of data leakage or loss. These efforts enhance operational resilience and the overall level of information security protection. As of 2024, Arcadyan has reported zero incidents involving client privacy violations or other major security breaches across all global sites, demonstrating Arcadyan's strong commitment to data security and continuous improvement.
###### Handling, Sharing, and Retaining Condential Information
Arcadyan places great importance on the protection and proper use of information assets. Through institutionalized management and ongoing awareness initiatives, Arcadyan ensures that all confidential information is handled, shared, and retained in full compliance with applicable laws and stakeholder expectations, while fulfilling its corporate responsibility for information confidentiality. Specific management practices include:
  * Employee Condentiality Obligations: All new employees are required to sign and comply with Arcadyan's written or implied confidentiality policies upon onboarding. During employment, employees are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of information related to clients, suppliers, and other business partners, and must fulfill their information security responsibilities within the scope of their roles.
  * Information Security and Data Protection: Employees must properly manage electronic files, printed documents, and communication records to prevent unauthorized access, leakage, or misuse. Through the implementation of information security policies, audit mechanisms, and training programs, Arcadyan strengthens employee awareness and actions to protect Arcadyan's and stakeholders' information assets.
  * Website Privacy Policy Disclosure: Arcadyan clearly discloses its "[Privacy Policy](http://Website%20Privacy%20Policy%20Disclosure:%20Arcadyan%20clearly%20discloses%20its%20"Privacy%20Policy"%20at%20the%20bottom%20of%20its%20official%20website%20homepage,%20including%20a%20notice%20stating:%20"This%20website%20uses%20cookies%20to%20enhance%20your%20browsing%20experience.%20By%20using%20this%20website,%20you%20consent%20to%20our%20use%20of%20cookies."%20This%20ensures%20informed%20consent%20from%20visitors%20regarding%20personal%20data%20processing,%20in%20accordance%20with%20legal%20requirements%20and%20digital%20transparency%20principles.)" at the bottom of its official website homepage, including a notice stating: "This website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. By using this website, you consent to our use of cookies." This ensures informed consent from visitors regarding personal data processing, in accordance with legal requirements and digital transparency principles.


Through these management practices and stakeholder communication mechanisms, Arcadyan continuously strengthens its security governance to ensure that the handling, storage, and sharing of all sensitive information is lawful, appropriate, and secure.
###### Data and Privacy Protection
In response to international data protection trends and relevant regulations in our operating regions, Arcadyan adheres to the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and local privacy laws. We have established a privacy policy that serves as the highest guiding principle for protecting the personal data of both internal and external stakeholders. Arcadyan's Information Security Department oversees the collection, processing, and storage of personal data, ensuring all processes comply with applicable regulations and our corporate code of conduct.
Arcadyan has established privacy complaint and reporting channels. Stakeholders who discover data misuse or privacy violations may file complaints through designated channels ([ethics@arcadyan.com](http://ethics@arcadyan.com)). In 2024, Arcadyan received no privacy complaints or penalty records from external parties or regulatory authorities, nor experienced any incidents involving customer privacy infringement or data breaches. This demonstrates the effective implementation of our data protection management and internal control mechanisms, reflecting our commitment to safeguarding customer privacy.

###  環境永續 
####  Environmental Sustainability 
# Energy Resources Management
#### Energy Use
The primary energy consumption at Arcadyan's operational sites comes from purchased electricity. To support the Group's net-zero emissions target, strengthening energy management has become a top priority in its decarbonization strategy. In order to systemically monitor and optimize energy use, Arcadyan has fully implemented the ISO 50001 Energy Management System across its headquarters and manufacturing center. Through standardized processes and real-time energy monitoring mechanisms, the company conducts in-depth analysis of energy hotspots within its facilities. Based on the analysis results, targeted strategies for electricity management and demand control are executed to enhance energy efficiency and achieve the combined benefits of energy conservation, cost reduction, and carbon emission reduction. In 2024, Arcadyan's energy intensity reached 743.5 kWh per million in revenue, representing a 15.2% reduction compared to 2023. This exceeded the annual target of a 1% reduction in energy intensity, demonstrating Arcadyan's firm commitment and tangible progress in improving energy efficiency.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926111617-1.png)
Arcadyan has implemented energy intensity tracking to continuously monitor energy and carbon performance per unit of operational output. This ensures that, even as the company expands its operations, it can steadily reduce carbon emissions per unit and advance in parallel toward both sustainable growth and climate responsibility.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926112953-2.png)
###### Arcadyan Headquarters Smart Power Management Initiative
Since 2023, Arcadyan’s Hsinchu headquarters has partnered with an external energy technology service provider to implement an energy management project. The initiative focuses on identified energy hotspots, such as high-consumption air-conditioning systems including chillers and cooling towers. Through energy-use structure analysis and the introduction of automated monitoring systems, the project has enhanced transparency and visualization of energy consumption. Variable frequency drives (VFDs) and temperature monitoring interfaces were installed on the chillers to transmit real-time temperature data to the central controller, which automatically adjusts the motor operation accordingly. This has improved system responsiveness and efficiency, reduced energy waste, and ensured stable indoor temperatures. Additionally, the installation of VFDs and monitoring interfaces has extended equipment lifespan and lowered maintenance costs. Arcadyan will continue to leverage innovative technologies and effective power management to advance its sustainability objectives.。
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2024/07/17/image-20240717155653-2.png)
###### Vietnam Manufacturing Center Energy Monitoring Control Room
In 2023, Arcadyan’s Vietnam Manufacturing Center established a real-time Energy Monitoring Control Room, supported by a 24/7 central monitoring system. The system enables energy consumption analysis, real-time alerts, and diagnostic functions to ensure transparency in electricity use and effective implementation of energy-saving measures. It promptly identifies abnormal consumption patterns and facilitates adjustments to optimize energy efficiency. As a result, the system saves approximately 360 MWh of electricity annually, equivalent to around 260 metric tons of carbon emissions. These efforts not only reduce energy costs but also minimize environmental impact, advancing Arcadyan’s goal of green production.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2024/07/17/image-20240717155842-3.png)
#### Water Resource Management
Arcadyan installs appropriate water treatment and management facilities based on the specific water usage patterns and wastewater characteristics at each operating site. These systems ensure that discharged water complies with regulatory standards while minimizing potential environmental impact. At headquarters, the kitchen is equipped with a grease separation system, effectively reducing the discharge of oily waste into the sewage system and the environment. All wastewater and discharge water across sites consistently meet or exceed local environmental standards. Ongoing water quality monitoring and risk management mechanisms are in place to further strengthen environmental protection efforts. Following the relocation of manufacturing capacity from China to Vietnam, the former China manufacturing center, now operating solely as the logistics and administrative office, no longer engages in production activities. Daily water consumption is limited to basic domestic use, resulting in a significant reduction in both water intake and discharge volumes, and thereby lowering environmental impact.
The Vietnam manufacturing center, which operates as an assembly-type facility, primarily uses water for domestic purposes. In 2024, approximately 77,719 cubic meters (m³) of wastewater were treated and reused through the onsite wastewater treatment system, achieving a 50% water recycling rate, effectively reducing reliance on municipal water supplies. Unrecycled wastewater is discharged into the municipal sewer system and processed at local wastewater treatment plants. Third-party testing is conducted annually to monitor water quality parameters including pH, chemical oxygen demand (COD), suspended solids (SS), ammonia nitrogen, total phosphorus, and total nitrogen. All test results complied with local discharge standards, with no instances of direct contamination to water bodies or soil. In 2024, no environmental violations, major spills, or lawsuits exceeding NT$2 million related to water discharge occurred at any Arcadyan site.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926113859-1.png)
In 2024, Arcadyan Group's average monthly water consumption per capita was 2.1 cubic meters/person, representing a 16.3% decrease compared to 2023. This achievement surpassed the annual water conservation target of a 1% reduction, demonstrating the effectiveness and consistency of water-saving efforts. The primary contributor to this improvement was the full implementation of a domestic wastewater recycling system at the Vietnam Manufacturing Center in 2024, which significantly improved reclaimed water efficiency and reduced dependence on municipal water supply. This system recycles domestic wastewater through a multi-stage filtration process, enabling water reuse. The initiative not only reduces overall water costs but also enhances the resilience and flexibility of wastewater management at the site, reflecting Arcadyan's strong commitment to water sustainability and environmental responsibility in its operations.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926114028-2.png)
###### Water Conservation and Recycling Measures
Arcadyan implements a variety of water conservation and recycling initiatives based on the function and water usage characteristics of each operating site. These efforts aim to improve overall water efficiency, reduce reliance on municipal water supplies, and strengthen the company's commitment to sustainable water resource management. The Arcadyan Headquarters, which serves as a research and development-focused office building, primarily consumes water for domestic purposes, with no use of process water. All wastewater is discharged into the municipal sewage system, causing no direct impact on local water bodies. To enhance water efficiency, the headquarters has adopted a rainwater harvesting system, automated irrigation equipment, and high-efficiency water-saving fixtures—maximizing the benefits of resource use through infrastructure upgrades.
Since its establishment in 2021, the Vietnam Manufacturing Center has been equipped with a rainwater harvesting system that collects rainwater and surface runoff through rooftop and ground catchment systems. After initial filtration, the water is reused for toilet flushing and landscape irrigation, effectively reducing the use of tap water. At the end of 2023, the site further implemented a domestic wastewater recycling system. Using a five-stage filtration process, the system treats and reuses both rainwater and domestic sewage collected in a central storage tank, and redistributes the water for various uses including toilet flushing, air conditioning makeup water, cooling circulation, and green area irrigation. In 2024, the rainwater and wastewater recycling systems together reclaimed 77,719 cubic meters of water, accounting for 50% of the site's total water usage. This significantly increased the proportion of recycled water and delivered substantial water-saving results. Arcadyan will continue to evaluate water usage patterns across its operations, gradually expand recycling system capacity, and optimize water management strategies to achieve more efficient and environmentally responsible water use.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926114231-3.png)

####  Environmental Sustainability 
# Environmentally Friendly Design
Arcadyan actively assesses climate-related risks and opportunities to its operations and embeds green design principles throughout product development. Following the Product Life Cycle (PLC) approach, the company evaluates environmental impacts across all stages—from raw materials and manufacturing to usage and end-of-life—with a focus on reducing resource use and carbon emissions. Aligned with circular economy principles, Arcadyan applies Cradle to Cradle design to support a sustainable “manufacture–use–recycle” model. Starting from design, the company enhances resource efficiency, minimizes pollution and waste, and advances eco-friendly innovation. This approach reduces environmental impact while strengthening product sustainability and competitiveness.
At the design stage, Arcadyan aligns customer needs and product functions with energy efficiency and low-carbon performance, while complying with global standards such as the EU Eco-design Directive. Since 2006, all products have maintained 100% compliance with the EU WEEE Directive and other regional laws, with no violations of labeling or voluntary standards—demonstrating a strong commitment to environmental compliance.
#### Arcadyan's Sustainable Product Development Journey
Arcadyan's product design is centered around four core principles: the use of low-toxicity materials, energy efficiency, ease of disassembly and refurbishment, and extended product lifespan. Since its founding, Arcadyan has continuously aligned with global sustainability trends, addressed stakeholder expectations and customer needs, and refined its environmentally friendly design capabilities. The company is committed to enhancing the sustainability performance of its product life cycle to achieve optimal eco-effectiveness.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926150356-1.png)
###### Product Life Cycle Assessment
Arcadyan conducts LCA in accordance with ISO 14040 and ISO 14044 standards, using specialized software to assess environmental impacts and carbon footprints. The assessment framework is aligned with the EU's Product Environmental Footprint (PEF) methodology and the Product Category Rules (PCR) for IT equipment, which define five key life cycle stages: raw material acquisition, manufacturing, distribution, use, and end-of-life treatment. Evaluations cover 27 environmental impact categories, including climate change, human toxicity, freshwater ecotoxicity, mineral resource depletion, and fossil resource depletion. In 2024, products undergoing LCA at the request of customers accounted for approximately 10% of total shipments— highlighting Arcadyan's commitment to transparency in environmental information and the advancement of sustainable product design.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926150548-2.png)
#### Arcadyan's Sustainability Strategy for Green Design and Circular Economy
In response to global challenges such as climate change and resource depletion, Arcadyan adopts Product Life Cycle Management (PLCM) as a core strategy. The company integrates environmental considerations into every stage of the “Cradle to Cradle” approach—including material selection, product design, manufacturing, usage, repair and refurbishment, and end-of-life recycling. Through this systematized and integrated sustainable design process, Arcadyan implements carbon reduction, energy efficiency, and resource circulation strategies to enhance product recyclability and environmental value.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926150703-3.png)
###### Use of Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) Plastics
Arcadyan actively promotes the circular use of plastic materials by developing high-recyclability plastic compounds and increasing the proportion of recycled content in its products. Since 2015, Arcadyan has incorporated 65% to 99% post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastic into product plastic components. For materials such as ABS or ABS+PC, a clip-fit structure is used in place of traditional screw-fastening methods to reduce screw usage, improve structural strength, and facilitate recyclability. In 2024, approximately 72% of Arcadyan's shipped products included recycled plastics, achieving its target of exceeding 70%. This reflects Arcadyan's strong commitment to advancing material circularity. The company will continue to enhance the development and application of recycled materials, aiming to reach a 75% adoption rate in customer products by 2025, thereby deepening the implementation of circular economy practices.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926150825-4.png)
###### Eco-Friendly Packaging Design
Arcadyan is committed to reducing the use of packaging materials by optimizing packaging structure to improve transportation efficiency and reduce carbon emissions. In material selection, the company prioritizes recycled paper and Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)-certified materials, and uses plant-based inks instead of traditional petroleum-based inks to reduce environmental impact. In 2024, over 84% of shipped products used recycled paper, and 80.6% were packaged with FSC-certified materials. Additionally, Arcadyan's Vietnam manufacturing site obtained FSC certification, further strengthening traceability and quality control of packaging sources.
Arcadyan also uses biodegradable materials such as industrial starch, plant fibers, and molded pulp foam for internal packaging components, enabling composability and natural degradation. However, in 2024, due to customer demands, these materials were replaced with more cost-effective and readily available paper-based alternatives. Going forward, Arcadyan will continue to monitor developments in sustainable materials and seek solutions that balance environmental and economic performance, supporting its circular economy and carbon reduction goals.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926151013-5.png)
###### Material Simplication and Improved Recycling Efciency
To enhance product recyclability, Arcadyan simplifies material composition by prioritizing single-material designs and reducing the use of mixed materials. For packaging, product information is printed directly on the outer box to minimize paper usage. Accessory bundling has shifted from traditional plastic ties to paper-based alternatives to reduce environmental impact. The product foot pads are designed to be replaceable, improving repair and refurbishment convenience and extending product lifespan. Additionally, electronic directive icons and EU compliance markings are integrated directly into the product housing, streamlining the manufacturing process and facilitating recycling. These measures reflect Arcadyan's comprehensive implementation of sustainable design and its strong commitment to environmental responsibility.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926151138-6.png)
###### Eco-Design of Products
Arcadyan was certified to ISO 14006 in 2018 and adopted a structured approach to ecodesign.  
This includes life cycle data collection and carbon assessment through four steps: goal and scope definition, Life Cycle Inventory Analysis, impact assessment, and interpretation. This systematic method enables a comprehensive understanding of environmental impacts across all product stages, with environmental disclosure reports used as the basis for thirdparty verification. The ISO 14006 eco-design standard has been applied to the development of Arcadyan's router and set-top box (STB) product lines. For example, the latest generation of routers achieves a reduction of approximately 4 kgCO2e per unit—around 7% of the total product emissions—and has received TÜV Green Mark carbon footprint verification. For STBs, the carbon reduction is approximately 2 kgCO2e per unit, or 5% of total emissions, with verified carbon footprint certification also obtained. Arcadyan will continue to expand the application of restricted substance management for raw materials, deepen the development of low-carbon products, and actively advance its environmental sustainability goals.
###### Improving Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Utilization
Arcadyan has implemented a high-efficiency PCB design strategy by reducing the distance between components and board edges to just 1 mm, increasing material utilization to over 85%. This reduces raw material use, lowers carbon emissions, and cuts procurement costs. Although this design requires overcoming challenges such as fixture limitations and edge stress risks, it significantly improves resource efficiency. Preliminary estimates suggest a potential carbon reduction of about 0.03%, supporting Arcadyan's green manufacturing and carbon reduction goals.
###### Design for Easy Disassembly (One-Hand Opening Structure)
To meet customer needs for product refurbishment and recycling, Arcadyan has introduced a one-hand opening structure in product design to improve maintainability and repairability. The design replaces traditional screwfastening with a screwless snap-fit mechanism, enabling quick and damagefree disassembly using specialized tools.
This approach shortens disassembly and repair time while eliminating the need to sort screws during recycling. The product housing uses a single plastic material to simplify recycling and avoid contamination from mixed materials. In 2024, four product models adopted this design. Through structural and process optimization, Arcadyan demonstrates its strong commitment to circular economy principles and environmentally friendly, serviceable product design.
###### Arcadyan Intelligent Power Management (AIPM)
Arcadyan has independently developed the Arcadyan Intelligent Power Management (AIPM) system, which uses smart microcontrollers (MCUs) to precisely manage product operation modes. The system automatically detects load conditions and dynamically adjusts power states in real time. In 2024, approximately 2.2% of Arcadyan's key customer shipments adopted AIPM. Testing showed that AIPM can reduce overall product energy consumption by 20% to 30%, significantly improving energy efficiency and supporting the company's low-carbon transition goals.
###### Circular Economy-Waste Recycling and Program
Arcadyan has established a closed-loop recycling model in collaboration with customers and supply chain partners. This model covers the full product life cycle—from market product recovery and material dismantling to purification and reintegration into new products. In 2024, Arcadyan recycled 3,909 kg of plastic, converting it into post-consumer recycled (PCR) material for reuse in manufacturing. This effort reduced approximately 28 metric tons of CO2e emissions and lowered reliance on virgin plastics.
Arcadyan will continue to strengthen partnerships with customers, recyclers, dismantlers, and suppliers to expand the types and applications of recovered materials. Through the “recover–reprocess–reuse” model, the company supports green supply chain transformation and demonstrates its commitment to circular resource use and greenhouse gas reduction.
![](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/uploads/2025/09/26/image-20250926151730-7.png)
