# Arcadyan Awarded Platinum Medal in 2024 EcoVadis Sustainability Rating.
2024 / 04 / 16 
![Arcadyan Awarded Platinum Medal in 2024 EcoVadis Sustainability Rating.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/EcoVadis_Platinum_Medal-%E5%B0%8F%E5%9C%96.png)
Arcadyan has been awarded the highest honor of "Platinum Medal" in the EcoVadis Sustainability Rating for the first time in April 2024, ranking in the top 1% for sustainability performance among participating companies.
EcoVadis is the largest and most reputable global enterprise sustainability rating organization, aiming to promote sustainable development in global supply chains and serving as a crucial benchmark for assessing corporate social responsibility (CSR) performance. EcoVadis establishes its rating methodology based on international sustainability criteria, including seven major management indicators and 21 sustainability standards, assessing four main themes: Environment, Labor and Human Rights, Business Ethics, and Sustainable Procurement.
Arcadyan is actively engaged in climate action, continuously improving green design, and providing customers with solutions that are more environmentally friendly and low carbon. By the end of 2023, Arcadyan had submitted its Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) goals and actively promoted energy transition to increase the proportion of renewable energy usage. Arcadyan also devotes to promoting a sustainable supply chain. Collaborating with customers, Arcadyan collaborates with customers in supplier CSR development and launched "Go Green with Arcadayn" project in 2023 to systematically assist supply chain partners in conducting organizational greenhouse gas inventories and product carbon footprint reduction plans. Arcadyan regularly reviews its sustainability performance, reducing risks while positively impacting the environment, promoting transparency in information, and continuing to drive innovation.

# Arcadyan scored Management Level in Climate Change by CDP.
2024 / 03 / 05 
![Arcadyan scored Management Level in Climate Change by CDP.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/CDP3_qoX48jb.jpg)
Arcadyan participated in the 2023 Carbon Disclosure Project (CDP) climate information disclosure and received a B Management Level rating in Climate Change.
The CDP questionnaire focuses on the disclosure of corporate greenhouse gas emissions and the management of climate-related impacts. In 2023, over 23,000 companies globally participated in the CDP questionnaire, with 624 companies from Taiwan, marking a 22% increase from the previous year. This growth highlights the rising importance of climate issues within the industry.
In addressing climate issues, Arcadyan actively participates in international initiatives and actions. In addition to designing products from a circular economy perspective, the company is also reducing carbon emissions across its processes and supply chain.
In 2023, Arcadyan set Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) goals, declaring 2022 as the base year. The company aims to achieve net-zero greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 1+2) by 2040 and net-zero indirect greenhouse gas emissions (Scope 3) by 2050. Arcadyan has formulated a comprehensive strategy to address climate change, which includes implementing the ISO 50001 energy management system, increasing the use of renewable energy, developing low-carbon products, adopting low-carbon transportation routes, and strengthening low-carbon supply chain management. By enhancing energy efficiency and focusing on low-carbon product development, Arcadyan is committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions and mitigating the impact of climate change.

# Arcadayn Invited to Participate in the Sustainable Supply Chain Summit, Sharing the Blueprint for Sustainable Supply Chain Actions
2024 / 01 / 22 
![Arcadayn Invited to Participate in the Sustainable Supply Chain Summit, Sharing the Blueprint for Sustainable Supply Chain Actions](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/20231226_%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E9%9B%BB%E4%BF%A1%E7%B6%A0%E8%89%B2%E4%BE%9B%E6%87%89%E9%8F%88%E9%AB%98%E5%B3%B0%E6%9C%83_0147.jpg)
Arcadyan Technology's remarkable achievements in promoting carbon reduction in the supply chain have been widely recognized. Mike Lu, the Executive Vice President of Arcadyan, was invited by Business Weekly Group and Chunghwa Telecom to speak at the 2023 Sustainable Supply Chain Summit. His presentation focused on sharing Arcadyan's efforts in implementing sustainable supply chain practices amid the global trend of sustainable transformation in the network communication supply chain.
The 2023 Sustainable Supply Chain Summit, themed "Smart Green Empowerment, Driving Sustainable Futures," took place on December 26, 2023, bringing together industry leaders to share their blueprints for sustainable supply chain actions. Arcadyan received an A- rating (Leadership Level) in the 2022 CDP Supply Chain Assessment, gaining international recognition for its supply chain sustainability efforts. During the forum, Mike Lu, the Executive Vice President, highlighted three key axes: "From Passive to Proactive, From Short-Term to Long-Term, From Individual to Collective." He shared specific actions and achievements of Arcadyan and its supply chain partners in effectively managing carbon emissions and implementing sustainable transformation.
Arcadyan initiated the "Supplier Development Program" in 2019, facilitating ESG improvement measures among suppliers through monthly communication and discussions. In 2023, the company launched the "Go Green with Arcadyan" project, assisting supplier partners in systematically reducing organizational greenhouse gas emissions and lowering product carbon footprints.
In the journey towards net-zero carbon emissions, large enterprises play a crucial role in influencing sustainability throughout the supply chain. Collaborative efforts with the supply chain are identified as a key strategy for successful net-zero transformation. Arcadyan is committed to actively advancing supply chain development, working closely with partners to achieve the goal of sustainable development.

# Arcadyan Dedicated to Green Product Development Earns it the Outstanding Product Award at 2023 Taiwan Circular Economy Awards
2023 / 10 / 27 
![Arcadyan Dedicated to Green Product Development Earns it the Outstanding Product Award at 2023 Taiwan Circular Economy Awards](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/Skype_Picture_2023_10_27T05_44_01_523Z.jpeg)
Arcadyan places great emphasis on both business development and environmental sustainability. Guided by four core values: innovation, harmony, surpass, and services, Arcadyan has been committed to green product design for an extended period. Today (27th), Arcadyan is honored to receive the Outstanding Product Award at the Fourth Annual (2023) Taiwan Circular Economy Awards.
Since 2020, Arcadyan has embraced BS 8001 Circular Economy Framework, incorporating green product mindset into production, from design and manufacturing to disposal and recycling. Arcadyan consistently put the 10R concept of circular economy into practice, aiming to minimize waste by refusing non-PCR (post-consumer recycled) materials, reducing components, designing products for easy repair and refurbishment, and optimizing product life cycle. These efforts have significantly reduced carbon emissions in the product manufacturing process.
Taiwan Circular Economy Awards, initiated by Chung-Hua Institution for Economic Research and the Center for Green Economy, are designed to encourage companies to adopt a circular economy mindset, alleviate resource pressures, and introduce a concept distinct from traditional linear and recycling economies. Arcadyan products stand out among numerous technology manufacturers and renowned computer brands, showcasing its strong capabilities in green product development. In response to increasingly stringent environmental regulations, Arcadyan is committed to continuous improvement and strives to become a leader in green networking equipment."

# Arcadyan hosted Supplier Conference, collaborating with supply chain partners for carbon reduction
2023 / 10 / 13 
![Arcadyan hosted Supplier Conference, collaborating with supply chain partners for carbon reduction](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/DSC_7982.JPG)
Arcadyan hosted a supplier conference on October 13, inviting 14 key supply chain partners to discuss the global net-zero trend and launch the "Go Green with Arcadyan" project. This project aims to systematically guide suppliers in organizational and product carbon reduction, working together to achieve carbon reduction goals.
Raymond Hsiung, Vice President of Arcadyan, noted that with the European Union's passage of the "EU Green Deal" in 2020, the push for carbon reduction in the market has grown stronger. Many clients are now evaluating sustainability performance as a criterion in their requests for proposals or quotations. In response to these international trends, Arcadyan joined the SBTi in 2022, setting ambitious carbon reduction strategies. Arcadyan also hopes to collaborate with the value chain to realize its carbon reduction goals.
Frank Chiang, Director of Supply Chain Management at Arcadyan, emphasized that carbon reduction is a global trend, and achieving corporate sustainability requires cooperation across the value chain to yield positive results. The "Go Green with Arcadyan" project aims to create a win-win-win situation, allowing Arcadyan, its supplier partners, and end customers to each fulfill their environmental commitments and contribute to achieving net-zero carbon emissions.

# Arcadyan marks International Coastal Cleanup Day by collecting 2,300 kg of marine waste
2023 / 09 / 16 
![Arcadyan marks International Coastal Cleanup Day by collecting 2,300 kg of marine waste](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/20230916_162005.jpg)
On International Coastal Cleanup Day (the third Saturday of September), 62 volunteers from Arcadyan joined The Society of Wilderness Beach Cleanup Campaign 2.3 tons of marine waste was removed from the northern beach of the North Embankment of Hsinchu Nanliao Harbor.
Collected waste was recorded with ICC guidelines, counting and tracking different types of marine trash. The accumulative data over the years have proven insightful in guiding environment policies making, making beach cleanups more than just picking up trash, but a citizen science project.
According to past data analysis, more than 90% of marine waste is plastic. Beach cleanups are just a way to raise awareness in ocean conservation, however, reducing waste at source is the way to achieve it. Arcadyan is well aware of the importance of raw materials management. ISO 14006 Ecological design was first implemented in 2017, then the framework of BS 8001 circular economy was incorporated to introduce post-consumer recycled (PCR) plastics in the products. Depending on product specifications and requirements, PCR plastics ratio increase yearly. In 2022, PCR plastic has been used in about 60% of customer products, accounting for about 40% of product shipment weight. In 2023, Arcadyan successfully manufactured products contain more than 95% PCR plastics to meet customer expectations and gradually achieve sustainable targets. Arcadyan furthermore collaborates with plastic suppliers to recycle discarded and non-reusable plastic casings into PCR plastic to implement the circular economy.

# Arcadyan achieves Gold Medal in 2023 EcoVadis sustainability ratings
2023 / 07 / 05 
![Arcadyan achieves Gold Medal in 2023 EcoVadis sustainability ratings](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/2023_ECOVADIS_GOLD.jpg)
Arcadyan has achieved Gold Medal in 2023 EcoVadis sustainability ratings with a 97th percentile. Arcadyan's performance in environment, labor & human rights, ethics and sustainable procurement are all above average industry score, and made big improvement in ethics.
Ecovadis is the world’s largest and most trusted provider of business sustainability ratings, aiming at promoting a sustainable global supply chain. EcoVadis rate a company’s sustainability management system through its policies, actions and results. The assessment focuses on 21 sustainability criteria that are grouped into four themes: Environment, Labor & Human Rights, Ethics and Sustainable Procurement. These criteria are based on international sustainability standards such as the Ten Principles of the UN Global Compact, the International Labour Organization (ILO) conventions, the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) standards, the ISO 26000 standard, the CERES Roadmap, and the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights, also known as the Ruggie Framework.
Arcadyan has been actively involved in international sustainability actions. Arcadyan continues to provide outstanding products by implementing carbon reduction measures, collaborating with customers and supply chain partners to reduce carbon footprint, and fulfilling its due diligence responsibility on supply chain human rights issues.

# Arcadyan joined Childre Are Us Foundation, brought love to the tribe.
2023 / 05 / 10 
![Arcadyan joined Childre Are Us Foundation, brought love to the tribe.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/IMG_2718.JPG)
It has been 15 years since Childre Are Us Foundation started the "Bring Love to the Tribes" Project. Arcadyan supported Childre Are Us Foundation for over a decade; employees donate Mother's Day cake order to the underprivileged tribal families. Every donation brought work opportunities for the physically/ mentally challenged, and some joy to the families in need.
The Social Participation Funtional Group of Arcadyan Sustainability Committee establishes annual charity plan. By hosting multiple events and activities, it provides a channel for employees to spread kindness and care about social issues together. This year "Little Engineer Cultivation Program" is brought to the tribe. Arcadyan corporate volunteers shared the behind-the-scenes of being an engineer, lead the students to experience VR with their mobile devices and taught how circuts work with a DIY project. 
"Arcadyan continues to support rural education in various ways. Other than the collaboration with Childre Are Us Foundation, Arcadyan also provided additional learning materials for Engligh. Arcadyan exepcts to integrate technology education and charity with more diverse and innovative means, fulfils its corporate social responsibilities and upholds "Equilibrium, Prosperity, and Inclusivity" to give back to the society." said Srcadyan Deputy Direct Wang.
Principal Tsai appreciates Arcadyan's support for providing English learning resources and brining delicious cakes for the students and their mothers.
Taoyuan and Hsinchu District CEO Yan of Childre Are Us Foundation thanks Arcadyan's collaboration for the past decade, from job training for the mentally challenged, to participating in the "Bring Love to the Tribes" Project, Arcadyan has been an important partner in supporting the physically/ mentally challenged.

# Arcadyan received Golden Award for Occupational Accident Free Record.
2023 / 05 / 06 
![Arcadyan received Golden Award for Occupational Accident Free Record.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E7%84%A1%E7%81%BD%E5%AE%B3%E5%B7%A5%E6%99%82%E9%87%91%E7%8D%8E.png)
Arcadyan in dedicated to workplace safety. From May 1st, 2008 to December 31st, 2022, Arcadyan recorded more than 15 million hours with no occupational accidents and received Golden Award in May, 2023.
"Business Occupational-Accident-Free Hours Recording Program" was promoted by the Industrial Safety and Health Association of the ROC and entrusted by the Ministry of Labor, to encourage business attending to labor safety and health, and act proactively to prevent occupational accident, ensuring labors' safety and health.
Arcadyan has introduced ISO 45001 Occupational Health and Safety Management System since 2005, formulated safety and health policies, and related procedural documents. Arcadyan also established the Occupational Safety Committee to ensure effective communication and consultation on occupational safety-related matters, and regularly inspect and maintain the working environment with hazardous factors to ensure workplace safety.

# Promoting energy management, Arcadyan Taiwan Headquarters introduced ISO 50001 standard.
2023 / 03 / 01 
![Promoting energy management, Arcadyan Taiwan Headquarters introduced ISO 50001 standard.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E5%9C%96%E7%89%871.png)
Responding to the cardon reduction committment advocated by the global climate actions, Arcadyan Taiwan Headquarters introduced ISO 50001 standard in May 2022, and completed the certification in March 2023. Dedicated to reducing carbon emissions from the organization and products and increasing energy efficiency, AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center also plans to introduce ISO 50001 standard in 2023 and completed the third-party certification.
The ISO 50001 standard is a certification created by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO). Its main goal is to assist businesses increase their energy efficiency, lower operation costs, improve energy performance and reduce green house gas emissions. Obtaining ISO 50001 certification not only meet cutomer's requirements and comply to domestic and international regulations, it also demonstrate a company's capability of sustainable operations.

# Arcadyan commended 15 suppliers for their excellent performance in quality, service and ESG
2023 / 02 / 24

Arcadyan Technology practices corporate social responsibility, encourage suppliers and partners to strive for excellence in technology, quality, service, society, environment, etc., and invite suppliers and partners to work together for sustainable development.

# AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center completed RBA audit, no priority and major non-compliances were found.
2023 / 01 / 03 
![AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center completed RBA audit, no priority and major non-compliances were found.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/RBA_Logo.png)
Arcadyan Technology Vietnam (AVC) Manufacturing Center completed a RBA (Responsible Business Alliance) audit with no priority and major non-compliances found, demonstrating Arcadyan's sustainable development implementations.
The Responsible Business Alliance (RBA), formerly the Electronic Industry Citizenship Coalition (EICC), is the world's largest industry coalition dedicated to corporate social responsibility in global supply chains. The RBA Code of Conduct establishes standards to ensure that working conditions in the electronics industry, or industries in which electronics are a key component, and its supply chains are safe, that workers are treated with respect and dignity, and that business operations are environmentally responsible and conducted ethically.
Arcadyan also took part in our customers' Sustainable Development Platform (SDP), assisting our suppliers follow the RBA Code of Conduct and Joint Audit Co-operation (JAC), to strenghthen and improve its ethics, labor rights, environmental protections and health and workplace safety. Thorugh the establishment of comprehensive management systmens, Arcadyan and its suppliers are able to provide excellent and competitive products, and create a strong and sustainable supply chain.

# Arcadyan presented with Best CDP Carbon Disclosure Award from CHT.
2022 / 12 / 09 
![Arcadyan presented with Best CDP Carbon Disclosure Award from CHT.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/2022%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E9%9B%BB%E4%BF%A1ESG%E7%B8%BE%E5%84%AA%E4%BE%9B%E6%87%89%E5%95%86%E5%A4%A5%E4%BC%B4%E5%90%88%E7%85%A7-CDP.jpg)
Arcadyan took part in 2022 CHT (Chunghwa Telecom) Supplier Sustainability Rating and was presented with Best CDP Carbon Disclosure Award in December.
Supplier Sustainability Rating System is a collaboration from CHT and SALcE (Sustainable Alliance for Low-carbon Economy). CHT entrusted an independent third party to conduct onsite audits of its suppliers to rate their ESG performance. Arcadyan was awarded for Best CDP Carbon Disclosure in 2022, another recognition's from CHT after being awarded as a Gold Level Certified Supplier in 2021.

# Arcadyan received the 2022 National Enterprise Environmental Protrection Award.
2022 / 11 / 04 
![Arcadyan received the 2022 National Enterprise Environmental Protrection Award.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/111%E5%B9%B4_%E7%B8%BD%E7%B5%B1%E5%BA%9C-%E4%BC%81%E6%A5%AD%E7%92%B0%E4%BF%9D%E7%8D%8E-%E9%9D%9E%E8%A3%BD%E9%80%A0%E6%A5%AD%E7%B5%84%E5%A4%A7%E5%90%88%E7%85%A7v.jpg)
Arcadyan Technology is the first professional and intelligent network terminal equipment company in Taiwan that integrates broadband, multimedia, wireless and Internet communication protocols. Responding to limited resources and waste pollution, Arcadyan rethinks its environment policy and modifies the design processes to incorporate circular economy. Being recognized for its sustainable operation, Arcadyan received the 2022 National Enterprise Environmental Protrection Award in November.
National Enterprise Environmental Protrection Award, presented by Environmental Protrection Administration, Executive Yuan, is the highest honor award for corporates that promote environmental protection. Corporates are evalauted by a team of experts and scholars on their performance in environment policy, energy and resource conservation, pollution prevention and environmental engagement.
Sustainable deveopment is one of the most important aspects for Arcadyan. All employees are dedicated to green designs and pollution preventions, including green procurement, life cycle analysis (LCA), sustainable develoment eco-design, for a safe and clean environment. Arcadyan implements innovative technologies to mitigate environmental impacts of climate change. By improving product safety, Arcadyan is able to provide cutomized product design and services, reduce the impact on the environment, and achieves its goal of sustainable deveopment- creating a better future through networking.

# Arcadyan committed to join Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) to further its carbon reduction resolution.
2022 / 10 / 01 
![Arcadyan committed to join Science Based Targets initiative \(SBTi\) to further its carbon reduction resolution.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/SBTi.png)
Arcadyan recognized the consequence of climate change. Since 2009, Arcadyan has proactively participated in Carbon Disclosure Project (CDP), to decrease operation risks and costs, and further transform various potential risks to business opportunities of green circular economy. Arcadyan submitted its commitment letter to join SBTi in October 2022 and plans to have its target validated in 2023.
Arcadyan sets 2022 as the base year, declaring that the organization's greenhouse gas (Scope 1+2) will achieve net zero by 2040. A near-term goal is set for an absolute reduction of 50% in 2030. Other indirect emissions of greenhouse gases (scope 3) are also planned to achieve net zero by 2050, with a near-term goal set for an intensity reduction of 66% by 2030.
The SBTi is a partnership between CDP, the United Nations Global Compact (UNGC), World Resources Institute (WRI) and the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF). It is taking lead to assist businesses to set net-zero science-based targets in line with a 1.5°C future - an urgent call to action from a global coalition of UN agencies.
With "creating a better future through networking" as the vision, Arcadyan embraces "technology innovation, humanity, self-exceeding and customer-oriented", demonstrates actions and performances in corporate governance, environmental sustainability, employee welfare, sustainable procurement and social engagement. Having positive interactions with stakeholders, Arcadyan continues to strive for a sustainable future while creating positive impacts in the value chain and the society, fulfill its responsibilities of a global coporate citizen.

# Rooftop photovoltaic system installation completed, AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center starts generating solar power.
2022 / 06 / 01 
![Rooftop photovoltaic system installation completed, AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center starts generating solar power.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E5%9C%96%E7%89%871_mKFyrl6.png)
Arcadyan introduced ISO 50001 standard in 2022 to improve energy efficiency, and support renewable energy. AVC Vietnam Manufacturing Center finished rooftop photovoltaic system installation in June 2022. The system contains about 15 thousand square meters of solar panels, and has generated around 175 kWh since it started operating in mid 2022, accounting for 8.9% of the electricity consumption of AVC Vietnam Production Center in 2022, and expected to reduce the electricity consumption of AVC Vietnam production center by about 15% every year. Currently AVC is planning for second-phase photovoltaic system installment, in hope to increase the newable energy used in the production.
Aside from building solar power infrastructures, Arcadyan is evaluating renewable energy certificate procurement to gradually increase green energy consumption. Arcadyan Taiwan Headquarters is proactively seeking suitable renewable energy partners to further low-carbon manufacturing.

# Arcadyan achieves Gold Medal in EcoVadis sustainability ratings.
2022 / 03 / 18 
![Arcadyan achieves Gold Medal in EcoVadis sustainability ratings.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/EcoVadis.png)
Arcadyan has achieved Gold Medal in 2022 EcoVadis sustainability ratings. Gold Medal is awarded to the top 5% in sustainability performance, it is a indicator of a company's excellent performance in environment, labor & human Rights, ethics and sustainable procurement.
Ecovadis is the world’s largest and most trusted provider of business sustainability ratings, aiming at promoting a sustainable global supply chain. EcoVadis rate a company’s sustainability management system through its policies, actions and results. The assessment focuses on 21 sustainability criteria that are grouped into four themes: Environment, Labor & Human Rights, Ethics and Sustainable Procurement. These criteria are based on international sustainability standards such as the Ten Principles of the UN Global Compact, the International Labour Organization (ILO) conventions, the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) standards, the ISO 26000 standard, the CERES Roadmap, and the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights, also known as the Ruggie Framework.
Arcadyan has been actively involved in international climate initiatives and actions, and will continue to collobarate with customers on low carbon strategy to create outstandihng products.

# Arcadyan scored Management Level in Climate Change by CDP.
2022 / 03 / 01 
![Arcadyan scored Management Level in Climate Change by CDP.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/CDP.png)
Arcadyan participated in 2022 CDP climate information disclosure and scored B- Management Level in Climate Change.
CDP runs the global disclosure system for investors, companies, cities, states and regions to manage their environmental impacts. More than 18,700 businesses participated in 2022 CDP, 380 of which are Taiwanese companies. This was a substantial growth compared with last year, indicating that climate issues have become increasingly important in the industry.
Arcadyan has been actively engaged in global climate initiatives and actions. In addition to designing the products from the perspective of circular economy, Arcadyan also puts in effort in manufacture process and supply chain decabonizations. Arcadyan also plans to announce their committment to join Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) this year.

# Arcadyan awarded as a Gold Level Certified Supplier by CHT.
2021 / 12 / 08 
![Arcadyan awarded as a Gold Level Certified Supplier by CHT.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/CHT%E6%B0%B8%E7%BA%8C%E5%A4%A5%E4%BC%B4%E9%87%91%E7%8D%8E.png)
Arcadyan took part in CHT (Chunghwa Telecom) Supplier Sustainability Rating and was awarded as a Gold Level Certified Supplier in December 2021.
CHT first lauched Supplier Sustainability Rating System in 2019. According to the audit results from SGS-Taiwan, CHT categorizes its supplier in four level - gold, silver, bronze and participated. Arcadyan, alogside with its customers, pays close attentions to climate topics, continues to implement decarboniation meaures to create an environmental friendly telecommuication industry.

# Arcadyan obtained BS 8001 circular economy business model_ optimization certification
2021 / 03 / 22 
![Arcadyan obtained BS 8001 circular economy business model_ optimization certification](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/%E6%9C%AA%E5%91%BD%E5%90%8D%E8%A8%AD%E8%A8%882.png)
Arcadyan follows the six principles of BS 8001 circular economy, introduces the design concept with the Planbureauvoor de Leefomgeving (PBL) 10R strategy, adopts the Introduction of Post Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastics, Designed for easy Refurbishment, Extend Products Life Cycle, and Reducing the use of product parts in existing product design thinking, and have be recognized by SGS as the Optimizing certification of business model in 2021.

# Arcadyan awarded with the Best Practice Award in Supply Chain Engagement at the 10th JAC CSR forum.
2021 / 03 / 03 
![Arcadyan awarded with the Best Practice Award in Supply Chain Engagement at the 10th JAC CSR forum.](https://csr.arcadyan.com/media/10th_JAC_forum_Best_practice_award_-_winner_Arcadyan.jpg)
Arcadyan was awarded with the Best Practice Award in Supply Chain Engagement at the 10th JAC CSR Forum in 2021. Arcadyan set up a broad supply chain program on conflict minerals, carbon emissions, circular economy and human rights. The reviewers commented that the measurement resulted in "improving key suppliers in the field of sustainable development, and it has brought significant CSR and financial benefits to both Arcadyan and its customers."
JAC CSR Forum is an annual sustainable event participated by JAC alliance members, EcoVadis, and distinguished individuals from the industry, government and academia. The 10th SCR Forum focused on the opportunity to integrate Circular Economy solutions into the Supply Chain, this year the Forum will look at forthcoming requirements addressing Supply Chain Sustainability in the field of Carbon reductions, Circularity and Human Rights.
Arcadyan offers innovative products and technologies, integrates supply chain resources, and take responsibilities for its economic, social and environmental impacts., providing a better sustainable solution for the industry and the earth.
###### [Arcadyan obtained BS 8001 circular economy business model_ optimization certification ](https://csr.arcadyan.com/en-us/news/14/)

## [智易科技專注永續，榮獲2023年度「TCSA台灣100大永續典範企業獎」 新竹，2023年11月15日－台灣永續能源研究基金會 (TAISE) 鼓勵產業界重視企業永續發展，每年度舉辦「台灣企業永續獎」，以企業永續報告書及企業永續綜合績效做為評比標準．智易科技於今日上午的頒獎典禮中，榮獲「台灣100大永續典範企業獎」及「企業永續報告獎－銀級」兩項獎項肯定，並由曾釗鵬總經理代表公司接受此項殊榮．TCSA台灣企業永續獎」評選活動，迄今邁入第十六屆，今年報名參賽企業達526家，創歷年新高；且歷屆累計家數達731家，占台灣上市公司市值的80%，顯見永續發展已成為各界關注重點。 智易科技總經理曾釗鵬代表接受台灣百大永續典範企業獎「台灣100大永續典範企業獎」及「企業永續報告獎銀級」 智易科技以「藉由網路創造未來更美好的生活」為企業永續發展願景，訂定共存、共榮、共好 (Equilibrium, Prosperity & Inclusivity, EPI) 三大永續主軸．自2020年起，智易科技導入BS 8001循環經濟標準，從產品設計、製造到廢棄、回收，遵循生態化設計與實踐循環經濟10R概念，盡可能地減少物質浪費，積極採用PCR (Post-Consumer Recycled) 可回收材料、採取減少零組件使用、易拆解回收、延長產品生命週期及節約能源的產品設計，大幅減少製造過程碳排．長期耕耘綠色產品設計的成果，本年度也同步榮獲國際環境永續組織SEAL頒發「SEAL企業永續產品獎」以及中華經濟研究院與綠色經濟研究中心「循環經濟獎－產品傑出獎」肯定． 智易科技響應全球氣候行動，2022年時簽署SBTi科學基礎減量目標倡議，訂定短期減碳、長期淨零的具體減量目標．台灣總部及全球製造中心每年進行ISO 14064組織型溫室氣體盤查，台灣總部與越南生產中心也於去年度導入ISO 50001能源管理系統，有效提升廠區能源效率；此外，越南生產中心已於園區內設置高功率輸出的太陽能光伏發電系統，並將於2-3年內持續擴大規模，可大幅提升再生能源利用，台灣總部也將於2026年完成太陽能發電系統建構。在綠色供應鏈部分，智易科技積極推動供應商CSR輔導計畫，推出「Go Green with Arcadyan」，系統化協助供應商進行組織型溫室氣體盤查及產品碳足跡減量計畫。 關於智易 智易科技成立於2003年，為國內領先整合寬頻/多媒體/無線及網際網路通訊協定之智慧型網路終端設備公司。致力於無線通訊及4G/5G高速網路裝置研發，結合語音及多媒體等技術，提供數位家庭、行動寬頻、無線網路影音多元解決方案。  more... ](https://www.arcadyan.com/zh-hant/news/3/44/)

## [Arcadyan monthly revenue November 2023 Arcadyan monthly revenue November 2023  Download ](https://www.arcadyan.com/media/news/Arcadyan_Monthly_Revenue_Nov_2023_EN.pdf)
## [Focused on Sustainability, Arcadyan is Awarded the Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award in 2023 Hsinchu, November 15, 2023 - The Taiwan Institute for Sustainable Energy (TAISE) encourages the industry to prioritize corporate sustainability development. Annually, it organizes the "Taiwan Corporate Sustainability Awards," evaluating companies based on their corporate sustainability reports and sustainability comprehensive performance. Arcadyan Technology Corporation, represented by General Manager Edward Tseng, received the "Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award" and the "Corporate Sustainability Reports Award - Silver Level" at today's award ceremony. The Taiwan Corporate Sustainability Awards (TCSA) selection event, now on its sixteenth year, attracted a record-high 526 participating companies this year, bringing the cumulative total to 731 companies over the years. This represents 80% of the market value of listed companies in Taiwan, underscoring the increasing focus on sustainable development across various sectors. Representing the company, Edward Tseng, General Manager of Arcadyan Technology Corporation, accepts the "Top 100 Taiwanese Sustainable Corporates Award" and the "Corporate Sustainability Reports Award - Silver Level" at the Taiwan Top 100 Sustainable Exemplary Enterprises Award ceremony. Arcadyan Technology Corporation, with the vision of "Creating a better future through the internet" for its corporate sustainability development, has established three major sustainability axes: Equilibrium, Prosperity & Inclusivity (EPI). Since 2020, Arcadyan has adopted the BS 8001 circular economy standard, adhering to ecological design and practicing the 10R concept of the circular economy from product design and manufacturing to disposal and recycling. This approach aims to minimize material waste by actively utilizing Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) recyclable materials, reducing component usage, facilitating easy disassembly and recycling, extending product life cycles, and designing products that conserve energy, thereby significantly reducing carbon emissions in the manufacturing process. The long-term commitment to green product design has yielded results. This year, Arcadyan has also been honored with the "SEAL Sustainable Product Award" from the international environmental sustainability organization SEAL. Additionally, it received recognition from the Chung-Hua Institution for Economic Research and the Center for Green Economy, which conferred the "Circular Economy Award - Outstanding Product Award" in acknowledgment of its achievements in circular economy practices. Arcadyan responds to global climate action by signing the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) in 2022, establishing specific short-term carbon reduction and long-term net-zero targets. The Taiwan headquarters and global manufacturing centers conduct an annual organizational greenhouse gas inventory based on ISO 14064. In the previous year, the Taiwan headquarters and the production center in Vietnam implemented the ISO 50001 energy management system, effectively enhancing the energy efficiency of the facilities. Moreover, the production center in Vietnam has installed a high-power output solar photovoltaic system within the industrial park, with plans to continuously expand its scale over the next 2-3 years, significantly increasing the utilization of renewable energy. The Taiwan headquarters is also set to complete the construction of a solar power generation system by 2026. In terms of green supply chain initiatives, Arcadyan actively promotes a supplier CSR guidance program through the "Go Green with Arcadyan" initiative, systematically assisting suppliers in conducting organizational greenhouse gas inventories and developing product carbon footprint reduction plans. About Arcadyan Founded in 2003, Arcadyan Technology specializes in broadband, multimedia, wireless and network communications. Arcadyan focuses on the research and development in wireless communications and 4G/5G high-speed network devices and combines the voice and multimedia technologies in order to provide diversified solutions for a digital home, mobile broadband system and multimedia over the wireless network.  more... ](https://www.arcadyan.com/en-us/news/3/44/)
